lead_paragraph: Fernanda Lima is on the frontline of the campaign to ensure  that the water of Rio's Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon, venue for the Olympic rowing regatta, is safe and clean.

headline.print_headline: Testing the Water on Rio's Lagoon
headline.main: Testing the Water on Rio's Lagoon
